Html:
Hi Gidon,

Thanks for this great plugin.

I just want to do when user mouse over the stars show the rating value, when they clicked they said "you have rated on (some value)" its all done in your java script example.

But what i really need is after  rated... again the user mouse over the star they hide the message "you have rated on (some value)" and show the star value and when they leave the mouse over the star they show text "you have rated on (some value)" .

Thanks,
Could you create a jsfiddle/jsbin, and I will try to adjust it according to your requirements.

Thanks for your reply,

I didn't use jsfiddle/jsbin before, but try to place html, css, js and attached star images. I really appreciate, if you can you do any thing with that!

here is link: http://jsfiddle.net/GF9Bb/3/

Thanks
Thank you Gidon, that's really what i need!
